apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a tender moment with a distinguished gentleman, his medium-dark skin tone rendered with Appleâ€™s signature realistic lighting and soft, rounded features. A gentle blush graces his cheeks, conveying a warm affection, while the slightly parted lips suggest a sweet kiss. This representation, with its subtle 3D shading and smooth gradients, captures a sense of romantic sentiment, often used to express love or a fond farewell.
